title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.60 - Ordering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.60 - Ordering

State Regulations

No practitioner shall obtain schedule II controlled substances except by means of his or her official Federal written order forms. Schedules II, III, IV and V controlled substances shall be obtained from manufacturers or distributors licensed under article 33 of the Public Health Law and this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.60

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
